title: Ragnarok: The Animation
overview: A great evil sweeps across the realm, and the young swordsman Roan, along with his life-long companion Yufa, must face it head on! As the two friends travel toward their destiny, they are joined by an ever-growing cast of heroes. The path they travel is rife with monsters, magic, and danger, but where there's a willâ€”there's a way! Lessons lurk in the darkness, and the journey starts now!
